pages.title: Welcome To TREPIDATION
pages.text: $(bold)$(#CC1717)The game PAUSES when checking $(#FFFF55)recipes$(#CC1717) and reading $(#FFFF55)this book$(#CC1717)!$()

$(#551012)This book is here to assist you and provide lore, but it won't hold your hand.$(br2)Progression relies on $(#FFFF55)curiosity and diligence$(#551012).$(br2)Make sure to frequently check $(#FFFF55)recipes$(#551012) (hover over item, press R) and $(#FFFF55)uses$(#551012) (press U) as you acquire new items.$(br2)Nearly $(#FFFF55)every item$(#551012) has a valuable use!

$(italics)$(#551012)Take your time and read carefully!$() $(br2)$(#551012)TREPIDATION provides plenty of hints and information scattered in $(#FFFF55)tooltips, recipes, chat messages, and descriptions.$(#551012)$(br2)You'll also want to keep your inventory sorted. Use $(#104455)middle-click$(#551012) while in any inventory to auto-sort.$()

$(#551012)Be sure to check this book $(#FFFF55)frequently$(#551012) as your acquire new items and progress. It will provide $(#FFFF55)hints and lore$(#551012) in a concise format to respect your time. The other categories in this book will be written in lore-friendly 1st person perspective.$()
